alert.note: Alert for Henry; Houston (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued January 25 at 6:33AM CST until January 25 at 6:45AM CST by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 645 AM CST FOR SOUTHEASTERN HENRY AND EASTERN HOUSTON COUNTIES... At 632 AM CST, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from Cuthbert to 10 miles southeast of Ashford, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Cottonwood, Ashford, Columbia, Gordon, Haleburg, Pansey, Crosby, Grangeburg, Chattahoochee SP, Lucy, Farley Nuclear Plant and Sealy Springs. TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 1000 AM CST for southeastern Alabama...and the Panhandle of Florida. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. To report severe weather contact your nearest law enforcement agency. They will send your report to the National Weather Service office in Tallahassee.
